episode_summary: In this episode, Kim Rittberg emphasizes the importance of balancing connection and credibility in video content for real estate agents. She offers practical advice on creating engaging social media videos by sharing personal stories and expert insights. The episode also highlights the use of AI tools like ChatGPT to generate content ideas.
